trans-unit.source: Specifies the edge or edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface where design-time processing is performed, such as a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> location on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a borda ou as bordas de um designer de atividade em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que o processamento de tempo de design é executado, como um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> local no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> that specifies where on the activity designer a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> or a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects reside.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O valor de enumeração retornado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>que especifica onde no designer de atividade um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>ou uma coleção de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>objetos residem.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> method can be used to retrieve this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A>método pode ser usado para recuperar esta coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use it to determine which edge or edges of an activity designer a user is resizing by observing the DesignerEdges enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar isso para determinar qual borda ou as bordas de uma atividade de designer de que um usuário está redimensionando observando o valor de enumeração DesignerEdges retornado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>

trans-unit.source: All edges of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Todas as bordas do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The bottom edge of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A borda inferior do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The left edge of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A borda esquerda do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: None of the edges of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma das bordas do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The right edge of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A borda direita do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The top edge of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A borda superior do designer de atividade.
